Generation V.Black: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.
Generation V.White: This ill-tempered Pokémon is dangerous because when it's angry, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
Generation V.Black 2: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
Generation V.White 2: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.

Generation VI.X: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
Generation VI.Y: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: When this ill-tempered Pokémon runs wild, it shoots lightning from its mane in all directions.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.

Generation IX.Scarlet: This Pokémon is aggressive and has a volatile disposition. When agitated, it will illuminate its mane in yellow and fire off bolts of electricity.
Generation IX.Violet: Once the herd hears thunder, it chases after the storm clouds so that the Blitzle in the group can use the lightning to charge up.

Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Mirage Islands (west of Route 104 , west of Dewford Town , north of Route 124 , south of Route 134 ), Mirage Mountain (south of Route 129 )
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Mirage Islands (west of Route 104 , west of Dewford Town , north of Route 124 , south of Route 134 ), Mirage Mountain (south of Route 129 )
